channel.title: Evolutionary Game Theory on Arnav Saxena
channel.description: Recent content in Evolutionary Game Theory on Arnav Saxena

item.title: Game theoretic approach for Word Sense Disambiguation
item.description: Implemented a novel word sense disambiguation model incorporating evolutionary game theory based on the 2016 Association for Computational Linguistics paper by Rocco Tripodi and Marcello Pelillo. Gihub Link: Github@DefinitelyArnav/NLP
